Package com.g1.mychess.email.service

Interface EmailService

All Known Implementing Classes:
EmailServiceImpl
public interface EmailService
Interface for defining the contract for email services. This interface outlines the methods for sending various types of emails, such as verification, blacklist/whitelist notifications, password resets, contact feedback, and tournament notifications. Implementing classes are expected to provide the actual implementation for these email-sending actions.

  • Method Details

    • sendVerificationEmail

      void sendVerificationEmail(String to, String username, String verificationToken)
      Sends a verification email to the user with a verification token.
      Parameters:
      to - The recipient's email address.
      username - The username of the user receiving the verification email.
      verificationToken - The token used for email verification.

    • sendBlacklistEmail

      void sendBlacklistEmail(String to, String username, String reason, Long banDuration)
      Sends a blacklist notification email to the user with the reason and ban duration.
      Parameters:
      to - The recipient's email address.
      username - The username of the blacklisted user.
      reason - The reason for the blacklist.
      banDuration - The duration of the ban in hours or days.

    • sendWhitelistEmail

      void sendWhitelistEmail(String to, String username, String reason)
      Sends a whitelist notification email to the user with the reason for being whitelisted.
      Parameters:
      to - The recipient's email address.
      username - The username of the whitelisted user.
      reason - The reason for the whitelist.

    • sendPasswordResetEmail

      void sendPasswordResetEmail(String to, String username, String resetToken)
      Sends a password reset email to the user with a reset token.
      Parameters:
      to - The recipient's email address.
      username - The username of the user requesting the password reset.
      resetToken - The token used for password reset.

    • sendContactUsEmail

      void sendContactUsEmail(String name, String email, String message)
      Sends a "Contact Us" email with the user's feedback.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the person submitting the feedback.
      email - The email address of the person submitting the feedback.
      message - The feedback message submitted by the user.

    • sendTournamentNotificationEmail

      void sendTournamentNotificationEmail(String to, String subject, String message)
      Sends a tournament notification email to the user with custom subject and message.
      Parameters:
      to - The recipient's email address.
      subject - The subject of the tournament notification.
      message - The content of the tournament notification.

    • sendMatchReminderEmail

      void sendMatchReminderEmail(String to, String tournamentName, LocalDateTime scheduledTime)

    • sendPlayerReportEmail

      void sendPlayerReportEmail(ReportEmailDTO reportEmailDTO)
